title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights enormous humanoid Titans in a desperate struggle for survival.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone and restore their bodies.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious spirit world and must find her way home.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A boy born without superpowers aims to become the world's greatest hero.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunters travel through space in search of criminals and meaning.
